summary:
Natural born traveler and music lover, with an uncontrollable passion for building online marketplaces and high performing teams.

I am international senior executive digital leader, with 10 years of experience running customer focused business units around the world. 
I am passionate about assembling and leading global, high performing teams into scaling technology enabled B2C or B2B businesses. 
I believe in focusing on customers, the power of confronting ideas, that facts and data are king, and the value of ambitious and innovative strategy combined with thorough and detailed execution to deliver sustainable results. 
I have high standards and a strong sense of commitment and ownership.
I believe that continuous learning is crucial to becoming a great leader, especially when combined with confidence in leading change and an appetite for new exciting challenges and territories.

awards.title: Speaker - Case Study: Implementing a New Business Model and Service to Achieve a Higher Level of Customer Engagement and Experience
awards.description:
Implementing a New Business Model and Service to Achieve a Higher Level of Customer Engagement and Experience

- Understanding the market opportunity and building a viable cross functional
business model by leveraging on existing resources in people, technology and
financing
- Uncovering how existing business unit runs and adapting to each operational
work-flow accordingly
- Building a solid platform to serve your partners, engaging and bringing them to
great heights across multiple channels and media
- Analysing your insights to identify the key drivers to enhance agility and taking
quicker and better actions to meet the emerging / changing needs

profile_positions.description:
Events (Aug 2018 – July 2019)
Led and completed the research and incubation phase for the new business, built and launched a prototype product for New York, including generation of value
added content to increase customer engagement. Presented investment plan for future build of the vertical.

Flights (Sept 2018 – July 2019) - Ad interim.
Led and completed the research and incubation phase for the new vertical. Built and launched an MVP product for 9 point of sales. Delivered 3 year strategy plan for the vertical. Hiring and handover.

In-stay Services (Dec 2018 – Dec 2019)
Delivered the development of a new multi-service hotel ancillary platform. Defined and implemented go to market strategy to scale the business. Delivered 3 year investment plan and hand over to Accommodation business unit.

Ground transportation (Sep 2017 - Dec 2018)
Created a new product and operations capabilities to on-board, compare and transact any urban transport method for the highest demand routes for travelers (airport to hotel, and back). Go to market in 13 cities with 9 suppliers, among which NS Dutch rails. Proven market fit. Handed over the ground transportation product & team to the newly created transport business unit.
profile_positions.title: Director of New Business

profile_positions.description:
A new startup generator, Antler turns the world’s best talent into great founders of great companies.

Antler selects the most passionate aspiring entrepreneurs, helps them find the right co-founder and connects them to a mentor network of fitting business and academic subject matter experts worldwide. Funding is also provided from day one to support founders building businesses they will own and run, and, that can positively impact local and global economies.

If you are a great talent that wants to build a great company, we would love to hear from you - please complete our application form to get in touch: https://www.antler.co/apply.
profile_positions.title: Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Global Fashion Group (GFG) operates across four continents and 27 countries, employing
over 9,500 people. With a focus on emerging markets, GFG targets a EUR 630bn fashion
market and over 2.5bn people who rapidly continue to move online and purchase via e-commerce.

GFG offers a wide assortment of leading international and local fashion brands, as
well as a selection of internal brands. GFG invests consistently in delivering the best customer
experience, including last-mile delivery networks where necessary.

The Global Fashion Group (GFG) operates through 5 leading fashion e-commerce companies across 5 regions: Zalora, Dafiti, Lamoda, Namshi and Jabong.
For further information visit www.global-fashion-group.com
profile_positions.title: Global Director - Marketplace Operations

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for building in 5 months a complete new business unit of Zalora. 
Reporting directly to the regional MD. Line management of a team of 7 FTEs and 7 dotted line local marketplace manager (whose lead teams of 6 to 8 FTEs). 
Shaping strategy and positioning of the business across the region; design of front end solution; defining product roadmap; defining all logistic, finance and customer service processes; preparing the IMC plan for the region; defining and analysing all BI reporting; defining sales strategy and target KPIs; granting objectives achievement across the region; defining local teams structure; defining and executing the seller relationship management strategy across the region; defining and executing regional partnerships; lead ventures to meet monthly business plan targets.
profile_positions.title: Regional Director, Marketplace

profile_positions.description:
Strategic implementation of Regional Product Roadmap: coordinating regional Product Management team (6 PMs) and 7 Local PMs; setting up consolidated reporting, optimizing resources, and implementing best practices for development team (21 developers). 
Ownership of product roadmap for: regional CRM, Mobile (iOS app, Android app and web-mobile), Promotions (vouchers and flash sales), Brand Ambassador Program. 
Line management of two Junior Product Manager.
profile_positions.title: Regional Director, Product Management

profile_positions.description:
Zalora Regional HQ 

As a Senior Product Manager l assisted with the launch of Zalora 8 shops (Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Vietnam, Philippines, Thailand, Taiwan, Hong Kong), now the biggest online apparel shops in the region. 
- Manage and prioritize product development and maintenance across 8 countries with development center previously based in China and Philippines, now in Germany and Singapore. 
- Build and implement effective process in order to handle change requests and backlog prioritization through scrum cycles and using agile (Jira). 
- Organized the shared code base migration plans: all Zalora ventures migrated within 3 months.
- Design of improvements and of new features for front-end and back-end 
- Manage infrastructure stability and QA assurance related activities. 
- Install process, train on platform use, and support on daily activities the QA team 
- Support local PMs working with backend (BOB), frontend (Alice), Payment gateway, Mailing System (UMS), Order Management System, CMS, Conversion Optimization. 
- Interface between Regional Teams to design and manage the development of new features and the rollout of new projects. 

www.zalora.com
profile_positions.title: Regional Senior Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a GVD I support the business development of new ventures in their most critical early stages.

Rocket Internet is the leading European Venture Capital Incubator within the internet industry. Companies include, Groupon (former CityDeal), eDarling, Zalando (2nd largest e-commerce company in the world outside of china), Dafiti, Lazada, Zalora, Zanui, Food Panda, The Iconic, and hundreds more.
profile_positions.title: Global Venture Development Senior Manager

profile_positions.description:
Winga - Online gaming and gambling; digital entertainment.

- monitor products profit and loss accounts
- implement online and offline marketing activities and projects to maximize online customers acquisition 
- management and reporting of campaigns and promotions specific to activating the existing community and potential customers

- follow and interact with top level customers.
profile_positions.title: Junior Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
Music on the cloud service provider; music business; social media; web 2.0. 

- Business Development 
- Participate to the licensing negotiation deal with all Major Labels operating in Italy (with LGV boutique, Samsung Italy, SCF) 
- Analysis of contract terms and fee structure of the deal; 
- Maintain product information and configurations on the web, ensuring accuracy, timeliness and customer-friendly presentation. 
- Analyze music industry trends and most specifically the cloud music market in order to build a competitive product positioning strategy. 
- Implement an integrated marketing and communication plan. 
- Coordinate and schedule resources, suppliers and partners through different projects. 
- Identify and implement new partnership (co-brands/co-marketing) opportunities and build a robust pipeline. 
- Implement online and offline marketing programs and projects to maximize online customers acquisition. 
- Develop editorial plan and content for online properties, landing pages or websites. 
- Maintain product information and configurations on the web, ensuring accuracy, timeliness and customer-friendly presentation
